The image in the claim shows a woman in: 2. A reverse image search revealed that the woman in the photo is actually an IAF flight lieutenant named Sneha Shekhawat, not Urvisha Jariwala as claimed.
Bharat: rakshak.com, an online database of military personnel, lists Sneha Shekhawat as an IAF officer and provides a link to her profile, which contains the same picture as the misleading post.
India: s national broadcaster, Doordarshan, interviewed Sneha Shekhawat in 2015 and published a tweet with her name overlaid on the same picture as the misleading post, further confirming her identity as the pilot.
